description_it: Insalata estiva con petto di pollo marinato al miele e limone, zucchine e melanzane grigliate, condita con misticanza e pomodorini.
description_en: Summer salad with honey-lemon marinated chicken breast, grilled zucchini and eggplant, dressed with mixed greens and cherry tomatoes.

steps.instruction_it: Marinare il pollo: disporre le fette in una pirofila, condire con olio, sale, pepe, miele, succo di limone e timo. Coprire e far riposare 1 ora.
steps.instruction_en: Marinate chicken: place slices in a baking dish, season with oil, salt, pepper, honey, lemon juice and thyme. Cover and rest 1 hour.

steps.instruction_it: Tagliare zucchine e melanzane a fette spesse 1 cm per il lungo. Tagliare i pomodorini in quarti.
steps.instruction_en: Cut zucchini and eggplant into 1 cm thick lengthwise slices. Quarter the cherry tomatoes.

steps.instruction_it: Scaldare una griglia, ungere con olio e grigliare zucchine e melanzane su entrambi i lati, salando a piacere.
steps.instruction_en: Heat a grill, oil it and grill zucchini and eggplant on both sides, seasoning with salt.

steps.instruction_it: Grigliare il pollo marinato per 4-5 minuti per lato, senza punzecchiare la carne. Salare subito dopo la cottura.
steps.instruction_en: Grill marinated chicken 4-5 minutes per side without piercing the meat. Salt immediately after cooking.

steps.instruction_it: Tagliare le verdure grigliate e il pollo a striscioline di circa 2 cm.
steps.instruction_en: Cut grilled vegetables and chicken into strips about 2 cm long.

steps.instruction_it: Far intiepidire le verdure, poi unirle in una ciotola con i pomodorini, il pollo e la misticanza. Mescolare e servire.
steps.instruction_en: Let vegetables cool slightly, then combine in a bowl with tomatoes, chicken and mixed greens. Toss and serve.
